metadata.title: CVE-2023-41053 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: Redis is an in-memory database that persists on disk. Redis does notcorrectly identify keys accessed by `SORT_RO` and as a result may grantusers executing this command access to keys that are not explicitlyauthorized by the ACL configuration. The problem exists in Redis 7.0 ornewer and has been fixed in Redis 7.0.13 and 7.2.1. Users are advised toupgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: redis package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
